wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan Andrew Kestenbaum, Baron Kestenbaum (born 5 August 1959) is the chief operating officer of RIT Capital Partners plc and a Labour member of the House of Lords. He is a former Chief Executive of the National Endowment for Science, Technology and the Arts (NESTA).

link_mentions.page: List of barons in the peerages of Britain and Ireland
